form.api_mode_help: Simple hides request settings and response assertions. Expected Result stays available.
form.expected_result_help: Optional. If provided, the response body must contain this text (and status must be 2xx/3xx).
form.request_section_help: These settings are sent to the target. They are not automatically validated.
form.request_query_params_help: Appended to the request URL. Not validated unless you add response assertions.
form.request_headers_help: Sent with the request. Not validated unless you add response assertions.
form.default_success_hint: Default check: 2xx/3xx status code is considered UP.
form.response_assertions_help: Optional. Leave empty to use the default (2xx/3xx) or the simple Expected Result.
form.component_help: Select which component this monitor belongs to on your status page.

status_pages.organize_help: Organize your status page with components and optional groups
status_pages.components_explanation: Components are the services/monitors you want to track (e.g., "API Server", "Website")
status_pages.groups_explanation: Groups help organize components into categories (e.g., "Backend Services", "Infrastructure")
status_pages.groups_optional: Groups are optional â€“ components without groups will display separately
status_pages.no_groups_yet: No groups yet. Groups help organize components visually.
status_pages.auto_save_help: Changes are saved automatically. You can edit component names and URLs inline, change groups, and reorder items.
status_pages.dependencies_help: Show third-party provider status boxes above your component groups.

remove_confirm.title: Remove Custom Domain?
remove_confirm.text: This will remove your custom domain configuration. You can always set it up again later.

remove_success.title: Removed!
remove_success.text: Custom domain has been removed and default domain set as primary.

set_primary_confirm.title: Set as Primary Domain?
set_primary_confirm.html:
This will make __DOMAIN__ your primary domain.
Your status page will be accessible at this domain by default.

set_primary_suggest.title: Set as Primary Domain?
set_primary_suggest.html:
Would you like to set __DOMAIN__ as your primary domain?
Your status page will be accessible at this domain by default.

set_primary_placeholder.text: Primary domain will be set once implemented.

cname.ok: CNAME is correctly configured. SSL provisioning will begin automatically.
cname.not_found: No CNAME found yet. Expected __EXPECTED__. DNS may take 5â€“30 minutes to propagate.
cname.mismatch: CNAME points to __DETECTED__, but expected __EXPECTED__. Update your DNS and try again.

settings.save_failed: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

verify.verified_body: Your custom domain has been successfully verified and activated.
verify.verified_fallback: Domain verified successfully! Page will reload.
verify.active_message: Your custom domain is now active
verify.pending_body: DNS record not found yet. We'll continue checking and notify you when verified.
verify.verify_failed: An error occurred during verification. Please try again.
verify.check_failed: Failed to check verification status. Please try again.

confirm.title: Delete status page?
confirm.body:
This action cannot be undone.
All components will be deleted and incidents removed. Monitors will be detached.
The slug will be blocked for 30 days.

remove_confirm.title: Remove custom palette?
remove_confirm.body: This will reset all colors to defaults.
remove_confirm.fallback: Are you sure you want to remove the custom color palette? This will reset all colors to defaults.

status_pages.primary_domain_help: Choose the main domain where your status page is accessible
status_pages.select_primary_help: Select the primary domain for your status page. Visitors will be redirected to this domain.

status_pages.owner_always_access: The status page owner always has access. By default, only team
status_pages.allow_subscribe_email: Allow visitors to subscribe via email
status_pages.subscribe_disabled_help: When disabled, the public "Subscribe" button is hidden and the subscribe API is blocked for this status page.

status_pages.showcase_description: Get featured in our public showcase to demonstrate your commitment to transparency and reliability. This is a great way to build trust with potential customers.

list.heading: Heartbeat Monitors
list.description: Monitor cron jobs, scheduled tasks, and background processes

form.name: Name
form.public_name_help: Leave empty to use the internal name.

modal.ping_help: Use this URL to ping your heartbeat monitor from your cron job or script:

validation.expected_required_when_no_autoinfer: Expected interval is required when auto-infer is off.
validation.expected_positive: Expected interval must be a positive number.
validation.expected_positive_seconds: Expected interval must be a positive number of seconds.
validation.grace_positive: Grace period must be a positive number.
validation.grace_positive_seconds: Grace period must be a positive number of seconds.

delete_confirm.title: Delete heartbeat?
delete_confirm.text: This will permanently delete "__NAME__" and its ping history.

info.title: How Heartbeat Monitors Work
info.description: Unlike regular monitors that check your services, heartbeat monitors wait for your cron jobs or scripts to ping them. If within the expected interval + grace period no ping is received, you'll be notified.

accept_success.title: Invitation Accepted
accept_success.text: You have joined the team successfully.

analytics.exclude_self: Exclude yourself from analytics on your own status pages
analytics.self_exclusion_help: When enabled, your visits to your own status pages won't be tracked by any web analytics you've configured. This helps keep your visitor data clean and accurate.

postmortem.not_available: Postmortem reports are not available on your current plan. Upgrade to enable this feature.
postmortem.publish_help: Once published it cannot be unpublished. Edits will update the content while keeping original publish date.

security.two_factor_auth_description: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account by requiring more than just a password to sign in.
security.scan_qr_code: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app:

two_factor.not_available: Two-Factor Authentication is not available on your current plan. Upgrade to enable this security feature.
two_factor.disable_prompt: To disable 2FA, please confirm with one of the following:

security.save_backup_codes: Save these codes in a safe place. You will not be able to see them again!
security.confirm_using_2fa: Confirm using one of the following:
security.security_keys_info: Security keys are hardware devices that provide strong two-factor authentication.

security_keys.not_available: Security Keys are not available on your current plan. Upgrade to enable this feature.

profile.gravatar_help: To change your avatar, head to Gravatar and update your profile picture.
profile.password_checked_breaches: Checked against known breaches when you save

password.help_has_password: Use a strong, unique password. Youâ€™ll need your current password to change it.
password.help_no_password: Youâ€™re currently using OAuth login only. Setting a password will enable email + password login.
password.fix_requirements_text: Please meet all requirements before saving.
password.failed_update: Failed to update password. Please try again.

export.heading: Export Your Data
export.description: Download a comprehensive ZIP archive containing all your data including status pages, monitors, monitor check results, incidents, and maintenance records. The data is organized into separate files for easy browsing and processing.

used_for.backup: Backup: Keep a local copy of all your monitoring data
used_for.migration: Migration: Transfer data to another instance or system
used_for.analysis: Analysis: Perform custom analytics on your uptime history
used_for.compliance: Compliance: Maintain records for audit and compliance purposes

privacy.title: Privacy & Security:
privacy.text: The exported data is generated on-demand and contains sensitive information about your monitoring setup. Keep this file secure and do not share it publicly.

archive_structure.heading: Archive Structure
archive_structure.description: The exported ZIP archive contains the following structure:

jsonl.title: JSONL Format:
jsonl.text: Monitors, incidents, and monitor results use JSON Lines format (one JSON object per line) for efficient processing of large datasets. This allows streaming and processing of huge lists without loading entire files into memory.

errors.failed_try_again: âœ— Export failed. Please try again.

warning.title: Permanent Account Deletion
warning.text: This action cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.

export_first.heading: Export Your Data First (Recommended)
export_first.description: Before deleting your account, we strongly recommend exporting your data. This allows you to keep a copy of your status pages, monitors, incidents, and other data for your records.

items.pages: All status pages and their configurations
items.monitors: All monitors and historical check data

export_first.note: You can export your data and then come back to this page to proceed with account deletion.

what_deleted.heading: What Will Be Deleted
what_deleted.description: When you close your account, the following data will be permanently deleted:

privacy_commitment.title: Privacy Commitment:
privacy_commitment.text: We follow GDPR guidelines. Your data will be permanently purged from our systems within 60 days, and audit logs within 90 days.

what_keep.heading: What We Keep (Legal Requirements)
what_keep.description: For tax and accounting compliance, we are legally required to keep:

items.billing_records: Billing transaction records only (transaction ID, amount, date)
items.no_tracking: These records contain no personal tracking data
items.no_operational_data: No status pages, monitors, or operational data are retained

what_keep.note: This is standard practice and required by tax authorities in most jurisdictions.

confirmations.export: I understand that I should export my data before deletion, or I'm okay with losing all my data permanently.
confirmations.final: I understand this action is permanent and cannot be undone.

final_warning.title: âš ï¸ FINAL WARNING
final_warning.text_strong: This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.
final_warning.text: This action cannot be undone. All your monitors, status pages, and settings will be permanently removed.

header.title: Get Help & Support
header.subtitle: Choose how you'd like to get in touch with our support team. We're here to help!

telegram.text: Ping us via Telegram for urgent assistance.

email.text: Email us, and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

community.text: Or, join our Discord community for peer support, updates, and discussions.
